resources.string: I\'m a student in system informatics who loves problem solving and programming. I\'m passionate about open source/free software and have good knowledge about the gnu/linux operating system. Before I started studying system informatics, I learnt web development by my self, primarily by using freecodecamp.

- Java, Kotlin, Android Development
- C#, dotnet
- Relational databases, SQL
- Frontend development, HTML, CSS, JS
- Modeling, UML, BPMN
- System analysis, design and implementation
